metadata.title: USN-7073-2 -- Linux kernel (Azure) vulnerabilities
metadata.description: Several security issues were discovered in the Linux kernel. An attacker could possibly use these to compromise the system. This update corrects flaws in the following subsystems:   - Watchdog drivers;   - Netfilter;   - Memory management;   - Network traffic control; (CVE-2024-27397, CVE-2024-38630, CVE-2024-45016, CVE-2024-26960)  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-7073-2` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  linux-azure-5.4-cloud-tools-5.4.0-1139 - 5.4.0-1139.146~18.04.1 linux-azure-5.4-headers-5.4.0-1139 - 5.4.0-1139.146~18.04.1 linux-azure-5.4-tools-5.4.0-1139 - 5.4.0-1139.146~18.04.1 linux-buildinfo-5.4.0-1139-azure - 5.4.0-1139.146~18.04.1 linux-cloud-tools-5.4.0-1139-azure - 5.4.0-1139.146~18.04.1 linux-headers-5.4.0-1139-azure - 5.4.0-1139.146~18.04.1 linux-image-5.4.0-1139-azure - 5.4.0-1139.146~18.04.1 linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-1139-azure - 5.4.0-1139.146~18.04.1 linux-modules-5.4.0-1139-azure - 5.4.0-1139.146~18.04.1 linux-modules-extra-5.4.0-1139-azure - 5.4.0-1139.146~18.04.1 linux-tools-5.4.0-1139-azure - 5.4.0-1139.146~18.04.1 Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro  linux-azure - 5.4.0.1139.146~18.04.1 linux-azure-edge - 5.4.0.1139.146~18.04.1 linux-cloud-tools-azure - 5.4.0.1139.146~18.04.1 linux-cloud-tools-azure-edge - 5.4.0.1139.146~18.04.1 linux-headers-azure - 5.4.0.1139.146~18.04.1 linux-headers-azure-edge - 5.4.0.1139.146~18.04.1 linux-image-azure - 5.4.0.1139.146~18.04.1 linux-image-azure-edge - 5.4.0.1139.146~18.04.1 linux-modules-extra-azure - 5.4.0.1139.146~18.04.1 linux-modules-extra-azure-edge - 5.4.0.1139.146~18.04.1 linux-signed-azure - 5.4.0.1139.146~18.04.1 linux-signed-azure-edge - 5.4.0.1139.146~18.04.1 linux-signed-image-azure - 5.4.0.1139.146~18.04.1 linux-signed-image-azure-edge - 5.4.0.1139.146~18.04.1 linux-tools-azure - 5.4.0.1139.146~18.04.1 linux-tools-azure-edge - 5.4.0.1139.146~18.04.1 Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
